arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start()
		
	Hydra.Wait(8) -- delay initial (technically all, but noticeable on first) firestorms to prevent bummer player death on world xfer
	
	tPlayers = Hydra.PlayerActors()
	for i, idPlayer in ipairs(tPlayers) do
		if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idPlayer) then
			-- Notify Power Erruption Owner(s) that World Boss is Active
			-- For ship 1-0-0, this will disable spawning monsters for Perf
			if Hydra.ActorIsAlive(idWorldBoss) then
				Hydra.BuffApplyToTarget(POWER_ERUPTION, S_POWER_ERRUPTION_BUFF_WORLDBOSS_ACTIVE, idPlayer);					
				-- Store World Boss ID to applied Buff for future use such as checking when World Boss is killed or escaped
				Hydra.BuffSetStoredData(idPlayer, POWER_ERUPTION, S_POWER_ERRUPTION_BUFF_WORLDBOSS_ACTIVE, idWorldBoss);
			end
	
			Hydra.ActorTriggerEnvironmentPower(idPlayer, idPlayer, POWER_ERUPTION, Hydra.TEAM_MONSTER_0)
		end
	end
end

function Start()
	-- firestorm will occur every 4 to 8 minutes
	delay = Hydra.GetRandomInt(240, 480)
	Hydra.Wait(delay)
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idWorldBoss) then
		-- Notify Power Erruption Target(s) that World Boss is Active
		-- For ship 1-0-0, spawning monsters are disabled for Perf
		local tPowerErruptionTargets = Hydra.PlayerActors();
		if #tPowerErruptionTargets > 0 then
			for i, idPowerErruptionTarget in ipairs(tPowerErruptionTargets) do
				if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idPowerErruptionTarget) then
					Hydra.BuffRemove(POWER_ERUPTION, S_POWER_ERRUPTION_BUFF_WORLDBOSS_ACTIVE, idPowerErruptionTarget);
				end
			end
		end

		idWorldBoss = Hydra.ACDID_INVALID;
	end
end
